013package org.apache.juneau.rest.vars;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016
017import java.util.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.bean.swagger.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.http.response.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
026
027/**
028 * Rest info variable resolver.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * The format for this var is <js>"$RS{key1[,key2...]}"</js>.
032 *
033 * <p>
034 * Used to resolve values returned by {@link RestRequest#getSwagger()}..
035 * <br>When multiple keys are used, returns the first non-null/empty value.
036 *
037 * <p>
038 * The possible values are:
039 * <ul>
040 *    <li><js>"contact"</js> - Value returned by {@link Info#getContact()}
041 *    <li><js>"description"</js> - Value returned by {@link Info#getDescription()}
042 *    <li><js>"externalDocs"</js> - Value returned by {@link Swagger#getExternalDocs()}
043 *    <li><js>"license"</js> - Value returned by {@link Info#getLicense()}
044 *    <li><js>"operationDescription"</js> - Value returned by {@link Operation#getDescription()}
045 *    <li><js>"operationSummary"</js> - Value returned by {@link Operation#getSummary()}
046 *    <li><js>"siteName"</js> - Value returned by {@link Info#getSiteName()}
047 *    <li><js>"tags"</js> - Value returned by {@link Swagger#getTags()}
048 *    <li><js>"termsOfService"</js> - Value returned by {@link Info#getTermsOfService()}
049 *    <li><js>"title"</js> - See {@link Info#getTitle()}
050 *    <li><js>"version"</js> - See {@link Info#getVersion()}
051 * </ul>
052 *
053 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
054 * <p class='bjava'>
055 *    String <jv>title</jv> = <jv>restRequest</jv>.getVarResolver().resolve(<js>"$RS{title}"</js>);
056 *    String <jv>titleOrDescription</jv> = <jv>restRequest</jv>.getVarResolver().resolve(<js>"$RS{title,description}"</js>);
057 * </p>
058 *
059 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
060 *    <li class='note'>
061 *       This variable resolver requires that a {@link RestRequest} bean be available in the session bean store.
062 *    <li class='note'>
063 *       For security reasons, nested and recursive variables are not resolved.
064 * </ul>
065 *
066 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
067 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/RestServerSvlVariables">SVL Variables</a>
068 * </ul>
069 */
070public class RequestSwaggerVar extends MultipartResolvingVar {
071
072   /** The name of this variable. */
073   public static final String NAME = "RS";
074
075   /**
076    * Constructor.
077    */
078   public RequestSwaggerVar() {
079      super(NAME);
080   }
081
082   @Override /* Var */
083   protected boolean allowNested() {
084      return false;
085   }
086
087   @Override /* Var */
088   protected boolean allowRecurse() {
089      return false;
090   }
091
092   @Override /* Var */
093   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String key) throws BasicHttpException, InternalServerError {
094      try {
095         RestRequest req = session.getBean(RestRequest.class).orElseThrow(InternalServerError::new);
096         Optional<Swagger> swagger = req.getSwagger();
097         WriterSerializer s = Json5Serializer.DEFAULT;
098         Optional<Operation> methodSwagger = req.getOperationSwagger();
099         char c = StringUtils.charAt(key, 0);
100         if (c == 'c') {
101            if ("contact".equals(key))
102               return swagger.map(Swagger::getInfo).map(x -> x == null ? null : x.getContact()).map(o -> s(o)).orElse(null);
103         } else if (c == 'd') {
104            if ("description".equals(key))
105               return swagger.map(Swagger::getInfo).map(x -> x == null ? null : x.getDescription()).orElse(null);
106         } else if (c == 'e') {
107            if ("externalDocs".equals(key))
108               return swagger.map(Swagger::getExternalDocs).map(ExternalDocumentation::toString).orElse(null);
109         } else if (c == 'l') {
110            if ("license".equals(key))
111               return swagger.map(Swagger::getInfo).map(x -> x == null ? null : x.getLicense()).map(o -> s(o)).orElse(null);
112         } else if (c == 'o') {
113            if ("operationDescription".equals(key))
114               return methodSwagger.map(Operation::getDescription).orElse(null);
115            if ("operationSummary".equals(key))
116               return methodSwagger.map(Operation::getSummary).orElse(null);
117         } else if (c == 'r') {
118            if ("siteName".equals(key))
119               return swagger.map(Swagger::getInfo).map(x -> x == null ? null : x.getSiteName()).orElse(null);
120         } else if (c == 't') {
121            if ("tags".equals(key))
122               return swagger.map(Swagger::getTags).map(x -> s.toString(x)).orElse(null);
123            if ("termsOfService".equals(key))
124               return swagger.map(Swagger::getInfo).map(x -> x == null ? null : x.getTermsOfService()).orElse(null);
125            if ("title".equals(key))
126               return swagger.map(Swagger::getInfo).map(x -> x == null ? null : x.getTitle()).orElse(null);
127         } else if (c == 'v') {
128            if ("version".equals(key))
129               return swagger.map(Swagger::getInfo).map(x -> x == null ? null : x.getVersion()).orElse(null);
130         }
131         return null;
132      } catch (Exception e) {
133         throw new InternalServerError(e);
134      }
135   }
136
137   @Override /* Var */
138   public boolean canResolve(VarResolverSession session) {
139      return session.getBean(RestRequest.class).isPresent();
140   }
141}
